title: Book 7: No Sense of Style
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 1,190 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 680L, Fiction Series
description: Mike is at it again with yet another scheme to make money quickly. Will he be successful this time, or will this be another business failure for the young entrepreneur? No Sense of Style is an engaging and entertaining story with strong characters and colorful illustrations that support the text. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify cause-and- effect relationships as well as to identify root words and their affixes.
